response.headline: Mount Io / Lake Mashu volcanic landscape in Hokkaido with sulfur deposits and warning signs
response.summary: Mount Io (Lake Mashu) in Hokkaido features active volcanic terrain with yellow sulfur deposits and steam vents. A warning sign marks the dangerous volcanic area. Cheryl comments that Hokkaido has become her favorite island destination.

extracted_text: DAMN Hokkaido you got me there. You're now officially my favourite island
image_details.key_interest: Active volcanic landscape with visible sulfur deposits and steam
